doc.field: Shr loss 28 cts vs profit three cts Net loss 18.9 mln vs profit 2.1 mln Assets 16.7 billion vs 19.8 billion Deposits 14.1 billion vs 16.2 billion Loans 12.2 billion vs 14.4 billion Note: Net includes securities gains of 20.4 mln vs 13.1 mln. Net charge-offs totaled 41.9 mln vs 42.2 mln, while provisions for loan losses was 56.6 mln vs 52.2 mln. Non-performing assets totaled 1.24 billion vs 799 mln. Reuter
